altDesc:

This isn't "hang cameras and hope." We engineer coverage, tune analytics, and build verified alert workflows so events are confirmed fast and escalated correctly.

What makes GreenJay different is architectural control and discipline: no single vendor, installer, or employee holds the full blueprint; the system is compartmentalized, governed, and deployed with Special Forces-style integration where every layer is planned, tested, and accountable. The result is security that stays discreet in a luxury environment, but performs like a military-grade program underneath—fast verification, controlled access, documented outcomes, and a posture that doesn't collapse when one component fails.
description: GreenJay designs estate security as a single architecture—home surveillance (AI-enabled video), access control, intrusion, and life-safety systems engineered into a hardened network. When something happens, it turns into guesswork—alerts without verification, response without clarity, and a mess when you need answers. GreenJay builds estate security as a single architecture. Surveillance, access control, intrusion, life safety, communications, and command center workflows—engineered into a hardened network, tuned for signal over noise, and run with procedures your team can execute under pressure.

title: TSCM / ELECTRONIC THREAT PROTECTION
subtitle: RF & DEVICE ASSURANCE
altDesc: Privacy fails in the electronic layer first. We locate and validate hidden or unauthorized devices, baseline your RF environment, investigate anomalies, and document findings in a way that supports real decisions—not assumptions.
description: Locate and validate hidden or unauthorized devices, baseline your RF environment, investigate anomalies, and document findings that support real decisions.
longDescription: Technical Surveillance Countermeasures (TSCM) is the rigorous process of verifying that sensitive spaces are free from covert technical surveillance, including audio, video, and data exfiltration devices. GreenJay positions this capability not as a commodity service, but as a critical layer of privacy assurance designed specifically for UHNW estates and high-stakes executive operations. Our method is doctrine-first and repeatable, ensuring that privacy is treated as a verified condition rather than an assumption. We operate with absolute discretion and minimal disruption to the principal's lifestyle or business tempo, integrating seamlessly with existing security details. While no environment can be guaranteed as impenetrable indefinitely, our verification process produces a level of confidence directly proportional to the scope of inspection and the access controls in place. Privacy verified, not assumed.

title: COUNTER-UAS INTEGRATION
subtitle: DETECT · VERIFY · ESCALATE
altDesc: Drones are now used to intrude on private property, disrupt lifestyle, and collect intelligence from the air—without ever stepping on your land. We treat counter-UAS as a workflow integrated into your estate operating picture.
description: Detection coverage, verification, evidence capture, and escalation rules integrated into your estate operating picture. Fast classification and controlled response.
longDescription: Unmanned aerial systems introduce a new class of threat—fast, remote, anonymous, and increasingly accessible. Counter-UAS Integration embeds aerial threat detection into your existing estate security architecture. We establish detection zones, classification workflows, evidence capture, and escalation doctrine so that unknown aerial activity is treated as an operational event, not a surprise. Each contact is identified, verified, and routed through defined decision pathways.
